article:
Three _ ago, my family got our first computer. _ the beginning of this summer, I found it was too old and I wanted to get a _ one. After my father and I talked for a long time, he _ . We went to many shops and read many ads. At last we bought an HP computer.
During the first week, I noticed _ our computer had some problems. I spent many hours trying to fix it, but it _ work. So I _ to phone the HP company and ask them _ to work out my problem. They told me to wait until the next morning because all their workers were _ that day.
The next morning two workers came. It took them many hours to mend it, but the computer  _  did not work. My dad had no other way but to return the whole thing. A few days later, we decided that I should go on the Internet and order some parts to build a new computer by _ .
It was not an easy job for me to build a new computer. I tried many times, and in the end I was successful. From these setbacks , I have learned a lot. Now I believe that if the HP computer hadn't had any problems, _ I would not have learned how to build the new one. Even though I spent lots of time on it, I know it wasn't a waste of time .
